# selectedOverlay

**Interface Property**

The selected overlay on the map.

## Declaration

```swift
selectedOverlay?: Overlay;
```

## Discussion

The default value is `null.`

## Configuring map overlays

- **overlays**: An array that contains all of the map’s overlays.
- **showsPointsOfInterest**: A Boolean value that determines whether the map displays points of interest.
- **pointOfInterestFilter**: The filter that determines the points of interest that display on the map.
